SELECT popup_board_sequence.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO popup_board (pop_seq, pop_title, emp_id, pop_content, pop_is_active, pop_write_date) VALUES (#{popSeq}, #{popTitle}, #{empId}, #{popContent}, #{popIsActive}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from employee order by emp_seq desc

SELECT pb.pop_seq, pb.pop_title, pb.emp_id, e.emp_name, --pb.pop_content, pb.pop_is_active,pb.pop_write_date, pb.pop_updated_date,pp.pop_period_seq, pp.period_type, pp.start_date,pp.end_date, pp.monthly_day, pp.weekly_day FROM popup_board pb LEFT JOIN popup_period pp ON pb.pop_seq = pp.pop_seq LEFT JOIN employee e ON pb.emp_id = e.emp_id ORDER BY (CASE WHEN ( (pp.PERIOD_TYPE = 'specific' AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(pp.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(pp.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)) OR (pp.PERIOD_TYPE = 'monthly' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') = LPAD(pp.MONTHLY_DAY, 2, '0')) OR (pp.PERIOD_TYPE = 'weekly' AND TRIM(UPPER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DAY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH'))) = UPPER(pp.WEEKLY_DAY)) AND pb.POP_IS_ACTIVE = 'true' ) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), pb.pop_is_active DESC, pb.pop_seq DESC

SELECT pb.pop_seq, pb.pop_title, pb.emp_id, e.emp_name, pb.pop_content, pb.pop_is_active, pb.pop_write_date, pb.pop_updated_date, pp.pop_period_seq, pp.period_type, pp.start_date, pp.end_date, pp.monthly_day, pp.weekly_day FROM popup_board pb LEFT JOIN popup_period pp ON pb.pop_seq = pp.pop_seq LEFT JOIN employee e ON pb.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE pb.pop_seq = #{empSeq}

SELECT pb.POP_SEQ, pb.POP_TITLE, pb.POP_CONTENT, pb.POP_IS_ACTIVE, pb.POP_WRITE_DATE FROM popup_board pb JOIN popup_period pp ON pb.POP_SEQ = pp.POP_SEQ WHERE ( (pp.PERIOD_TYPE = 'specific' AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(pp.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(pp.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)) OR (pp.PERIOD_TYPE = 'monthly' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') = LPAD(pp.MONTHLY_DAY, 2, '0')) OR (pp.PERIOD_TYPE = 'weekly' AND TRIM(UPPER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DAY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH'))) = UPPER(pp.WEEKLY_DAY)) ) AND pb.POP_IS_ACTIVE = 'true'
